description: Alum and business entrepreneur, Chris Cline, created the Cline Family Endowed Scholarship to encourage the next generation of business leaders. Eligibility requirements Undergraduate student Must be enrolled full-time Preference given a 2BL Junior or Senior Preference given towards a 2BL student that has an interest in Real Estate, Construction or Design

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

criteria.description: SIS_Classification is Junior   and SIS_Classification is Senior
